desc: Murray River Salt Flakes sold in the USA by Golden Grove Global. Gourmet pure natural low sodium Chef finishing salt 100% natural Australian - not Himalayan - flaky pure sea salt rich in minerals and enzymes. Murray River Salt Flakes are produced using the pristine mineralized brines from ancient saline aquifers.

layout.text:
A SOFT, FRAGILE AND
SUPERIOR TEXTURE
Loved by world famous Michelin Star Chef's, restaurant owners and self proclaimed foodies from around the globe.
